properties.address: 39 Aberdeen Walk, Scarborough, North Yorkshire YO11 1BD
properties.description: We are a welcoming and accessible space, open daily. We are open to all including children if they are supervised by an appropriate adult. We provide free tea, coffee and biscuits. We also have soups and cakes and extras available depending on what has been donated. There is always a selection of books, board games and jigsaws, as well as free wi-fi. People are free to chat to others, or just sit in comfort and warmth.
properties.title: Age UK North Yorkshire Coast & Moors (Scarborough)

properties.address: High Street, Burniston, Scarborough, North Yorkshire YO13 0HJ
properties.description: Open from 20/10/22 We welcome everyone We have level access on entry and throughout the building. We provide newspapers, a library, games, Jigsaws, children's activities
properties.title: Burniston Methodist Church

properties.description: Jubilee Hall is an old school that is owned by the Parish Council. It has accessible access and a portable ramp with disabled facilities. Each Thursday we provide a free light meal to people who attend. In the winter this is soup and a hot pudding , in warmer months sandwiches and cake plus hot/cold drinks.
properties.title: Cayton Community Drop In

properties.description: Eastfield Community Library - warm cafe space offering free drinks and hot soup from 1st December to 31st March.
properties.title: More Than Books

properties.address: 450 Scalby Road, Scarborough, North Yorkshire YO13 0PX
properties.description: We are a public library which people can join for free. They can borrow books for free and other resources for a small charge. We also have a suite of computers for public use with free use for 1 hour. We have photocopying and laminating facilities. There is a machine for refreshments and we have free wifi. We have weekly activities and groups for Under Fives and adults. We also run events for school aged children in school holidays.
properties.title: Newby and Scalby Library and Information Centre

properties.description: The space is open to all and will have tea and coffees plus board games, magazines and snacks
properties.title: Sacarborough office

properties.address: Vernon Road, Scarborough, North Yorkshire YO11 2NN
properties.description: We are a Public Library and run a wide variety of children's events, film events, author talks, special seasonal events and are always have a warm welcome to all our customers and the wider community. Enjoy our comfortable chairs and hunker down with the newspaper, a good book or access our Wifi.
properties.title: Scarborough Library

properties.address: St Columba Church, , Scarborough, North Yorkshire YO12 7JH
properties.description: We are there & open for anyone to come in Church services on Sundays & Wednesday followed by tea, coffee & biscuits. Alternate Tuesdays, 2 - 3.30pm we are open for Coffee, Cake & a Chat. Please do come along, there is plenty of chatter, come & make new friends. We have free Wi-Fi, jigsaws & newspapers
properties.title: St Columba Church

properties.description: the Church is open to everyone, there is a cafe open 11am-4pm, toilet facilities including disabled access. we have community spaces set up around the church that have magazines, jigsaws and games.

properties.description: Eastfield Community Free fridges provides donated food to anyone in need (Â£1 charge) to avoid sending food to landfill. Food is donated by Morrisons, Bookers, Cooplands FareShare and Westway Open Arms and includes fridge items, bread, tins, packets, fresh fruit and veg and other items. Bring your own bag!
